NewsArticle.Title: Experience/Ability Bonus Event
NewsArticle.Content: |------------------------Ability & Experience Event------------------------| Starting October 21st until October 24th all registered accounts will receive 50% Extra Experience and Ability Points gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. Halloween Double Bonus Weekend: Oct 28th-31st, double bonus on Experience and Ability Points gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. Dark Ages Team
